summary: Resolved conflict in .claude-output.json by choosing the origin/main version, which contains the REST API implementation metadata for PR #232 (chi router, handlers, middleware). The HEAD version contained gRPC-server-3 feature metadata from an earlier sprint task, which was superseded by the REST API work being merged.
strategyUsed: chose origin/main for .claude-output.json: the metadata file tracks the current PR's (#232) feature work (REST API chi router and handlers), while HEAD contained stale metadata from the prior grpc-server-3 task; preserving origin/main ensures accurate PR tracking
